item.title: Sara add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "Stepping onto a brand-new path is difficult, but not more difficult than remaining in a situation, which is not nurturing to the whole woman." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Sara add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description:
"I can be changed by what happens to me. But I refuse to be reduced by it.
(Popular misquote of "You may not control all the events that happen to you, but you can decide not to be reduced by them.")" -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Sara add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "My mission in life is not merely to survive, but to thrive; and to do so with some passion, some compassion, some humor, and some style" -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Sara add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "Ask for what you want and be prepared to get it!" -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Sara add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "I don't trust people who don't love themselves and tell me, 'I love you.' ... There is an African saying which is: Be careful when a naked person offers you a shirt." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Sara add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "If I am not good to myself, how can I expect anyone else to be good to me?" -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Sara add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "Have enough courage to trust love one more time and always one more time." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Sara add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "Never make someone a priority when all you are to them is an option." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Sara add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "When you learn, teach, when you get, give." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Sara add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "I don't trust anyone who doesn't laugh." -- Maya Angelou
